html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-04602025-03-23PS, CBSA
ActCustoms Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Regulations Amending Certain Regulations Administered and Enforced by the Canada Border Services Agency
PrecisRegulations Amending the REGULATIONS AMENDING CERTAIN REGULATIONS ADMINISTERED AND ENFORCED BY THE CANADA BORDER SERVICES AGENCY in order to replace the repeal of the regulatory provision that allows importers or owners of commercial goods registered in Canada Border Services Agency Assessment and Revenue Management to participate in the Release Prior to Payment Program without giving financial security 180 days after the regulations came into force with a repeal date of May 20, 2025.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2025-0116 Publication Date: 2025-04-09
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the REGULATIONS AMENDING CERTAIN REGULATIONS ADMINISTERED AND ENFORCED BY THE CANADA BORDER SERVICES AGENCY in order to replace the repeal of the regulatory provision that allows importers or owners of commercial goods registered in Canada Border Services Agency Assessment and Revenue Management to participate in the Release Prior to Payment Program without giving financial security 180 days after the regulations came into force with a repeal date of May 20, 2025.
